column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2024), Jabatan Kebajikan Masyarakat, Schiavina M., Melchiorri M., Pesaresi M. (2023): GHS-SMOD R2023A - GHS settlement layers, application of the Degree of Urbanisation methodology (stage I) to GHS-POP R2023A and GHS-BUILT-S R2023A, multitemporal (1975-2030)European Commission, Joint Research Centre (JRC) PID: http://data.europa.eu/89h/a0df7a6f-49de-46ea-9bde-563437a6e2ba, doi:10.2905/A0DF7A6F-49DE-46EA-9BDE-563437A6E2BA

All the percentages for electoral demographics are calculated by Tindak Malaysia using Electoral Roll data. There is no official ethnic demographic data. All ethnic data is an estimate. Orang Kurang Upaya (OKU) or People with Disabilities (PWD) count is an estimate. Age groups are based on the age of the voters as of 31/12/2024. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
